description: Try our easy to follow Italian Tomato & Kale Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,One-pot,Tree nut free,Kale,Egg free,Winter,Peanut free
name: Italian Tomato & Kale Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Campbells Real Stock Vegetable Salt reduced
2 Macro Organic Tomatoes Diced No Added Salt

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat. Add onion and cook for 10 minutes or until softened. Add tomatoes, beans and stock. Cover with lid, increase heat to mediumhigh and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, for 15 minutes. Place kale on top of soup mixture, then cook, covered, for a further 15 minutes or until kale is tender.
Stir kale through soup and season. Ladle mixture into bowls and top with a dollop of ricotta. Scatter over zest and serve with sourdough.
